body.p:
Lawrence Co Ky March 18 1861
Governor MaGoffin

we whose names are annexed to this paper would represent that Joseph oroark who stands convicted in the Lawce Circuit Circuit Court for retailing ardent spirits is aged 72 years is a poor man & not in the habit of vending ardent spirits -- we think he is a proper subject for the interposition of Executive clemency & earnestly desire that you would remit that portion of the fine due the Commenwealth

Signed
S Short
M H Johns
F. M. Meerril
John M
Fred McHenry
H Diamond Esq
Jas Wellman Esq
singed
Jas. M. Rice
